creator: andre@tektix.com
text:
In tomcat 4.1.10, the applet parameters <jsp:param name="name" value="value"/>

are translated to

<embed ... name="name" value="value" ...>

instead of

<embed ... name="value" ...>

creator: kin-man.chung@sun.com
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13536 ***
